short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A content tracker that let to detect the score and the order of GeoGuessr rounds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A content tracker that let to automatically detect the score and the order of GeoGuessr rounds and to transmit it to the SquadGuessr web-app.

SquadGuessr is an independant and external app that let to display the score of several players fighting against each other in the GeoGuessr game.

This finally let to refresh the score which is displayed on SquadGuessr in real-time.
